content: 4 single_crochet decrease * 6 30 round 10 3 single_crochet decrease * 6 24 round 11 2 single_crochet decrease * 6 18 start stuffing the body round 12 1 single_crochet decrease * 6 12 finish stuffing the body round 13 decrease * 6 6 f/o 2 paws make four start with a magic_ring round 1 4 single_crochet in the magic_ring 4 round 2 1 single_crochet increase * 2 6 round 3 2 single_crochet increase * 2 8 round 4 3 single_crochet increase * 2 10 round 5 1 single_crochet in each stitch 10 f/o assembling place the head between rounds 8 and 9 place the paws between rounds 8 and 9 the front paws should be placed 1 and 1/2 stitches from the head the back paws should be placed two stitches from the front paws pride turtles gay pride turtle round 1 and round 2 are worked in red round 3 is worked in orange round 4 is worked in yellow round 5 is worked in light blue round 6 is worked in blue round 7 is worked in purple trans pride turtle round 1 and round 2 are worked in light blue round 3 and round 4 are worked in pink round 5 is worked in white round 6 and round 7 are worked in pink round 8 is worked in light blue bisexual pride turtle round 1 round 2 and round 3 are worked in hot pink round 4 and round 5 are worked in purple round 6 round 7 and round 8 are worked in blue asexual pride turtle round 1 and round 2 are worked in black round 3 and round 4 are worked in grey round 5 and round 6 are worked in white round 7 and round 8 are worked in purple 3 these are the colors i have tried so far hopefully it will help you make as many pride turtles as you want please do not distribute sell print otherwise give away or claim as yours any part of this pattern pictures included you may sell finished products using this pattern however i ask that you credit ambroscrochet 4
